DOC.brief_summary: The propose of this study is to describe recovery and experience of pain and health related quality of life after robot-assisted laparoscopic hysterectomy for women with Endometrial Cancer or Atypical Complex Hyperplasia.
DOC.brief_title: Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Hysterectomy-RALH- Postoperative Complications, Quality of Life and Health Economics
DOC.criteria: Women suspected of having Endometrial Cancer or having Atypical Complex hyperplasia Ability to understand and speak Danish Ability to cooperate Provision of written informed consent Having a benign condition after histopathology postoperatively Bing assigned to radiation or chemotherapy postoperatively
